name: Muc-Off Dry Chain Lubricant
description: One of the most versatile items in your maintenance kit. This liquid lube is designed for dry or dusty conditions, and it can be applied to your chain, cleats, shifters or derailleurs. If you keep your bike's moving parts properly lubricated, they last longer and work better. It's a win-win.Easy to use in a drop-on application.Fine point tip lets you apply to hard-to-reach places.Wax-based formula reduces friction between links, resists dirt pick-up and prevents rust formation.Can be applied to derailleurs, cleats and shifters.Pervents corrosion on metal surfaces.Suitable for road, MTB and cyclocross bikes.
